channel.title: Live mode breaks libreoffice
channel.description:
On persistent mode works fine. Live-mode: user@host:~$ libreoffice --calc javaldx: Could not find a Java Runtime Environment! Please ensure that a JVM and the package libreoffice-java-common is installed. If it is already installed then try removing ~/.config/libreoffice/4/user/config/javasettings_Linux_*.xml Warning: failed to read path from javaldx
Fatal exception: Signal 11 Stack: /usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libuno_sal.so.3(+0x3d523)[0x7e8803e1d523] /usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libuno_sal.so.3(+0x3d733)[0x7e8803e1d733] /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(+0x37840)[0x7e8803c44840] /usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libuno_cppu.so.3(+0x14b32)[0x7e8801062b32] /usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libuno_cppu.so.3(uno_type_any_assign+0x97)[0x7e8801061f27] /usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libmergedlo.so(+0x2aac888)[0x7e88068ea888] /usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libmergedlo.so(+0x2aad565)[0x7e88068eb565] /usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libmergedlo.so(_ZN3utl10ConfigItemC2ERKN3rtl8OUStringE14ConfigItemMode+0x7b)[0x7e88068e07db] /usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libmergedlo.so(+0x2b02028)[0x7e8806940028] /usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libmergedlo.so(_ZN19SvtSysLocaleOptionsC1Ev+0x11f)[0x7e880694151f] /usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libmergedlo.so(_Z7InitVCLv+0x1a0)[0x7e8806c954f0] /usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libmergedlo.so(+0x2e58a8d)[0x7e8806c96a8d] /usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libmergedlo.so(_Z6SVMainv+0x30)[0x7e8806c96ae0] /usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libmergedlo.so(soffice_main+0x91)[0x7e8805d68de1] /usr/lib/libreoffice/program/soffice.bin(+0x107b)[0x582655fe907b] /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(__libc_start_main+0xeb)[0x7e8803c3109b] /usr/lib/libreoffice/program/soffice.bin(+0x10ba)[0x582655fe90ba]

item.title: Live mode breaks libreoffice
item.dc:creator: madaidan
item.description:
If it is already installed then try removing ~/.config/libreoffice/4/user/config/javasettings_Linux_*.xml

Have you tried removing that?

Read full topic

item.title: Live mode breaks libreoffice
item.dc:creator: zilika
item.description:
On persistent mode works fine.
Live-mode:
user@host:~$ libreoffice --calc
javaldx: Could not find a Java Runtime Environment!
Please ensure that a JVM and the package libreoffice-java-common
is installed.
If it is already installed then try removing ~/.config/libreoffice/4/user/config/javasettings_Linux_*.xml
Warning: failed to read path from javaldx

Fatal exception: Signal 11
Stack:
/usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libuno_sal.so.3(+0x3d523)[0x7e8803e1d523]
/usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libuno_sal.so.3(+0x3d733)[0x7e8803e1d733]
/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(+0x37840)[0x7e8803c44840]
/usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libuno_cppu.so.3(+0x14b32)[0x7e8801062b32]
/usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libuno_cppu.so.3(uno_type_any_assign+0x97)[0x7e8801061f27]
/usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libmergedlo.so(+0x2aac888)[0x7e88068ea888]
/usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libmergedlo.so(+0x2aad565)[0x7e88068eb565]
/usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libmergedlo.so(_ZN3utl10ConfigItemC2ERKN3rtl8OUStringE14ConfigItemMode+0x7b)[0x7e88068e07db]
/usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libmergedlo.so(+0x2b02028)[0x7e8806940028]
/usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libmergedlo.so(_ZN19SvtSysLocaleOptionsC1Ev+0x11f)[0x7e880694151f]
/usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libmergedlo.so(_Z7InitVCLv+0x1a0)[0x7e8806c954f0]
/usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libmergedlo.so(+0x2e58a8d)[0x7e8806c96a8d]
/usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libmergedlo.so(_Z6SVMainv+0x30)[0x7e8806c96ae0]
/usr/lib/libreoffice/program/libmergedlo.so(soffice_main+0x91)[0x7e8805d68de1]
/usr/lib/libreoffice/program/soffice.bin(+0x107b)[0x582655fe907b]
/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(__libc_start_main+0xeb)[0x7e8803c3109b]
/usr/lib/libreoffice/program/soffice.bin(+0x10ba)[0x582655fe90ba]
